title: Software Engineer
description: Development of an E-commerce store for sales clerks using Symfony and Drupal. Work in sprints with Agile methodology.

title: IT Support Technician
description: Installation, integration and updating of new equipment, control and audit of workstation configuration, assistance and advice to users on peripheral security (backups, passwords) and data protection, management of IT assets, management of technical incidents and troubleshooting.
